title: CH23 Chair Soaped - Oak
body: The CH23 Chair first saw the light of day in 1950 as part of the five pieces created by Hans Wegner. A wooden dining chair with paper cord seat, it has been the best seller since it was released. Showcasing Wegner’s unique style and insightful craftsmanship, the chair is unsurpassed for its comfort. It makes a practical fitting around the table even in small rooms because it has no armrest. Its simplicity of design is enhanced by superb details of construction.
